imdb.plot outline: Supercreeps follows the journey of three misfits, Kyle, Craig and Cassie whose attempt to run a failing music venue results in a hilarious sequence of events with one ambitious idea to save it - get David Bowie to play there. Kyle is the optimistic club owner who lacks the artfulness (and any knowledge about music promotion) to cope with the oddities of the modern world let alone the music industry.
imdb.title: Supercreeps
plot: Three less than qualified hopefuls try to set up a music venue in Camden.::Andy Mosse

_Supercreeps_ (qv) follows the journey of three misfits, Kyle, Craig and Cassie whose attempt to run a failing music venue results in a hilarious sequence of events with one ambitious idea to save it - get David Bowie to play there. Kyle is the optimistic club owner who lacks the artfulness (and any knowledge about music promotion) to cope with the oddities of the modern world let alone the music industry.::Neil Watson
